message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. It's a unique opportunity to get your hands on something truly special. I'm willing to sell it to you for $7,500. I think this is a fair price considering the product's value to you.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only able to offer $7,000 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement.

Hi Bob, thanks for your offer. I understand that you're willing to pay $7,000, but I was thinking more along the lines of $7,800. I'm willing to meet you halfway and make a compromise. I think this price is still a great deal for you, and I'm confident you'll love the product.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to compromise. Based on my budget, I can offer $7,600 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.

Hi Bob, I appreciate your latest offer, but I'm still a bit above your budget. I'm willing to make another compromise and offer you a price of $7,700. This is the lowest I can go, and I think it's still a great deal for you. What do you think?
